title: Red snapper with fennel and garlic
ingredients: ['75ml extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 fennel, thinly sliced', '1 shallot, minced', '30g chopped fresh parsley', '1 (2kg) whole red snapper', 'salt and pepper to taste', '60ml dry white wine', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '3 tablespoons minced garlic']
